body.name: Space Saving LED Desk Lamps, Touch Adjustment 10 Color Temperatures &10 Brightness Eye-Caring Modes, Swing Arm Desk Light with Clamp,Lamp for Home Office 360° Spin Memory Function-Metallic Black

Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 19 hrs 27 mins
features: 【Ultimate Folding Design for Space-Saving】 The Reifeiniwei desk lamp features an innovative structural design. When not in use, it can be maximally minimized and folded to the edge of the desk, occupying no desk space and maintaining an always tidy and visually appealing workspace.

【Multi-Scene Application Lamp Clamp】 The lamp's clamp is suitable for desks up to 2.2 inches thick and includes protective silicone to avoid scratching the desktop. With two mounting methods and 360° flexible joint, the lamp can be clamped wherever needed.Even in various complex scenarios, you can still find a usage state that meets your needs

【100 Lighting Modes】 The lamp features a continuous touch dimming design, where a mere finger slide can easily adjust the light, without any complex buttons. It's easy to operate and includes a memory function to automatically restore the last settings used. With 10 brightness levels and 10 color temperatures, it offers up to 100 lighting modes, allowing you to adjust according to your environment to meet your needs.

【Multiple Powering Options】The lamp comes with a 65-inch long power cord and can be powered by any 5V USB device, including laptops, power strips with USB ports, power adapters, and more. It can also be powered by a portable power supply in case of a power outage at home. Note: When using an external power source, please check if the output is 5V/2A. Adequate output ensures the lamp functions perfectly.

【Professional Eye-Care Lamp】The lamp is equipped with 102 energy-saving 0.5W LED beads, with a Color Rendering Index (CRI) of over 90 and a lifespan of 50,000 hours. It's free from ghosting, shadows, or glare, providing a focused and comfortable light，Minimize the harm of blue light to the eyes.Suitable for offices, workstations, reading rooms, studios, bedside lighting, and nail salons.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Truly Space Saving Desk Lamp High Brightness & Easy Touch Adjustment & Space Saving & Eye Protection
Unique structural design that can fold the desk lamp at the edge of the table, keeping the table clean and beautiful
The touch design is simple and easy to operate, 100 different light combinations to meet different needs of people
Multi angle adjustment design, screen facing down suitable for children, screen facing up suitable for adults
Previous page Next page Multi Scenario Application 1 Outdoor Use 2 Multipurpose clamp 1 3 Multipurpose clamp 2 4 Multipurpose clamp 3 5 Lamp Certification

Uniquely Designed Desk Lamp Easy Adjust & 100 Lighting Combinations & Ultimate Folding Our desk lamp adopts a unique structural design that can be folded to the extreme without occupying desktop space when not in use. With scientific touch adjustment of color temperature and brightness, even with 100 color temperature and brightness combinations, it can be quickly adjusted to meet the needs of different lighting in various usage scenarios Desk Lamp Folding Steps Desk lamp on a small desktop, it can be folded at the edge of the table When the desk lamp is clamped on a small children's table, it can be folded on the edge of the table when not in use, without occupying any space on the table, making the table clean and beautiful Desk Lamp Folding Steps Desk lamp on a large desktop, it can be folded at the edge of the table When the desk lamp is clamped onto a large worktable, it can be folded at the bottom of the table when not in use, without occupying any space on the table, making the table clean and beautiful Touch Screen Operation Introduction 100 light source combinations to meet various learning and work needs Long press the 1S power icon to turn on/off the machine, touch the M icon, and when the M icon turns red, slide the middle area to achieve 10 levels of color temperature adjustment (2700K-7000K). Touch the M icon, and when the M icon turns blue, slide the middle area to achieve 10 levels of brightness adjustment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This light is awesome. I love the style, it is beautiful and super functional. The touch controls (dim and change color temp) are futuristic and work great (see image). Overall, well worth the price and then some! I am going to buy a few more.The only down side is: the light segment does not articulate in such a way that it is parallel with the work surface when tilted down (see image.) However, this is not a big deal; again, for the price, you cant beat it. I am buying another for my main workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp, but no USB adapter.
reviews.reviewText: I gave the lamp 4 stars only because it has a USB cord but comes with no adapter to plug it in, and the product description doesn't mention this anywhere. The lamp is nice quality and works well. Although the lack of a wall adapter is not a huge deal, it is an inconvenience because I don't have a spare and have to borrow one that's already in use to try the lamp out and will ultimately have to buy one at the store. Extra cost and inconvenience knocks one star off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Focuses light perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Item arrived quick and on time. Packaged well. And easy to set up. It has a typical screw clamp to secure light to work table or bench. My work table is about 1/2 inch to 1inch thickness and this clamp has plenty of room to secure it tightly to my table. On the top of the table clamp is the first joint of the first length of extension. At this joint you have the capability of rotating the entire lamp in a 360 degree circle around my work space and a good size wing screw that will lock the swivel into place so it won’t move once it’s in place. This joint also allows me to raise or lower the arm. The second leg of the lamp allows for raising and lowering even more but again no way to lock it in position. This leg also holds the on and off button along with the slider for intensity or brightness desired. It runs along the entire top of the leg of this extension. The light itself is a third extension and again can move up or down but again no way to lock it in place. The only issue I have is if I have all 3 extensions are extended completely out and I lower it too low it does not have enough tension to hold the light up off my workspace. But that doesn’t bother me as I simply re clamp the light closer to my work which eliminates that issue. As an older man who needs readers to read and focus on intricate details I need good lighting that focuses on area I’m working on. This light does the trick and am completely happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great lamp. I paint ceramics and do puzzles and its perfect to clamp to the side of the table for extra light. My so is a artist and he had bought one and loved it, especially the feature where the lighting can be adjusted to suit your need. My husband works on computers this will be great for him, will give him light for those small areas. We all three recommend. great price, great lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lamp is bright, customer service is great
reviews.reviewText: The lamp initially dropped down when extended. the seller worked with me extensively and fixed the problem. I appreciate the help and the lamp really is a good one - very adjustable and bright.Very happy to report the more powerful one isn't powered by USBB and it comes with its own plug.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Updated Review - Good Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: Was a really cool lamp. Touchscreen on the side was dope to change the settings. Decided not to work today when I went to turn it on. No outlets will make it run, died 3 days outside of my return window.--------------------------------Updated Review --The company saw my plight on here after my first lamp died only a few days outside of the return window and they essentially overnighted me a new lamp for free. It arrived the same as two-day shipping, and this one seems firmer. I did not ask for a refund or replacement, but they reached out to me and offered it. That is cool first of all.Second, I think my first one just had something wonky with it because the new one out of the package is already better. Better machined hinge movement, feels more expensive than the first, more receptive to touch on the digital display this time. Maybe its just my mind making me think that, but its definitely a decent product for the cost. Hopefully this one last a long time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This desk lamp is extremely versatile in positioning and light spectrum. It adjusts in countless ways and functions extremely well. If searching for a desk lamp I would recommend this one without hesitation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nifty Versatile Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: The lamp head is 11.5" long. The control arm is 14.5" long. The split arm (closest to the clamp) is 16" long. My plan was to extend it from a shelf to my computer, hovering over my desk and freeing up desk space. A clearly-written instruction manual comes with it, and the controls are intuitive and easy to work. Slide your finger up or down the control panel to get the brightness/temperature you want. And it will remember the last setting when you turn it back on. I don't understand impatient reviewers who complain that they have to keep their finger on the on/off control for maybe a whole second. Made sturdily with lots of adjustability of each arm and lamp head. Unfortunately, mine would not extend out horizontally and hold the position; the joint closest to the clamp would not stay rigid so it did a slow droop and I had to prop it with a box. I contacted the company for instructions on how to tighten this joint, followed the easy instructions, but it was already as tight as it was going to be. I have another work area needing adjustable lighting where I can mount it vertically, and it functions perfectly there, allowing me to swivel it into different positions. When I let the company know I'm keeping it for this other use, though they had offered to replace it, they gave me a full refund. Wow. Very conscientious folks who care about what they sell. Wish all sellers were this honest. Don't hesitate to make a purchase.
